23 
24  void KSGenLComposite::Dice( KSParticleQueue* aPrimaries )
25  {
26  KSParticle* tParticle;
27  KSParticleQueue tParticles;
28  KSParticleIt tParticleIt;
29 
30  double tLValue;
31  vector< double > tLValues;
32  vector< double >::iterator tLValueIt;
33 
34  fLValue->DiceValue( tLValues );
35 
36  for( tLValueIt = tLValues.begin(); tLValueIt != tLValues.end(); tLValueIt++ )
37  {
38  tLValue = static_cast<int>(*tLValueIt);
39  for( tParticleIt = aPrimaries->begin(); tParticleIt != aPrimaries->end(); tParticleIt++ )
40  {
41  tParticle = new KSParticle( **tParticleIt );
42  tParticle->SetSecondQuantumNumber( tLValue );
43  tParticles.push_back( tParticle );
44  }
45  }
46 
47  for( tParticleIt = aPrimaries->begin(); tParticleIt != aPrimaries->end(); tParticleIt++ )
48  {
49  tParticle = *tParticleIt;
50  delete tParticle;
51  }
52 
53  aPrimaries->assign( tParticles.begin(), tParticles.end() );
54 
55  return;
56  }
57 
58  void KSGenLComposite::SetLValue( KSGenValue* anLValue )
59  {
60  if( fLValue == NULL )
61  {
62  fLValue = anLValue;
63  return;
64  }
65  genmsg( eError ) << "cannot set L value <" << anLValue->GetName() << "> to composite L creator <" << this->GetName() << ">" << eom;
66  return;
67  }
68  void KSGenLComposite::ClearLValue( KSGenValue* anLValue )
69  {
70  if( fLValue == anLValue )
71  {
72  fLValue = NULL;
73  return;
74  }
75  genmsg( eError ) << "cannot clear L value <" << anLValue->GetName() << "> from composite L creator <" << this->GetName() << ">" << eom;
76  return;
77  }
78 
79  void KSGenLComposite::InitializeComponent()
80  {
81  if( fLValue != NULL )
82  {
83  fLValue->Initialize();
84  }
85  return;
86  }
87  void KSGenLComposite::DeinitializeComponent()
88  {
89  if( fLValue != NULL )
90  {
91  fLValue->Deinitialize();
92  }
93  return;
94  }

96  STATICINT sKSGenLCompositeDict =
97  KSDictionary< KSGenLComposite >::AddCommand( &KSGenLComposite::SetLValue, &KSGenLComposite::ClearLValue, "set_L", "clear_L" );
98
